creator: mmz661
title: IM CATBUG
description: This project is a design based on the internet character Catbug. The creator used SketchBook Pro to create the design, but had some issues with the multiply layer.
steps: Start with a template in SketchBook Pro.
Drag the template into SketchBook Pro.
Use symmetry Y to color in the sweater.
Put the Multiply layer onto the sweater so the texture transfers through.
Make a top layer to sketch the design.
Create a layer over the sketch and use a pen to make dark lines, then delete the sketch layer.
Place a layer between the design and the sweater color to color the design without affecting the lines or sweater color.
